pageTitle: Protein and Iron rich Adai recipe,ADAI RECIPE,How to make Adai,Easy Breakfast recipe,South Indian Lentil dosa,Rice and Dal Adai
textBeforeTable: Recipe of Adai Adai is a popular breakfast snack or tiffin from the cuisine of Tamil Nadu. It is a very simple recipe yet very delicious, healthy and nutritious. Description mins Preparation Time Rice Main Ingredient 1 hour Cooking Time September 17, 2007 Published 0 persons Servings sreya85 Author 6 reviews so far Rate the recipe --> September 17, 2007 sreya85 6 Adai My Recipebox:
textAfterTable: Directions Soak rice for 4 to 5 hours only. Soak all the dals together for 2 hours only . Grind Rice, Dals, red chillies, together. The dough should be coarse(dals should be half grinded). Note : The dough should not be watery. It should be thicker than a normal DOSAI dough. Mix grated Coconut, Onion, Curry Leaves, Salt and Turmeric Powder to the dough. Heat Tawa. Grease Tawa with little oil. Pour the dough in the Tawa. Make a round shape. Make a hole in the center and another 5 holes a little distance from the center. Pour Oil in each hole and on the adai to make it crispy. Wait till it is golden reddish brown in colour and turn it. Again pour oil in each hole and little on top of adai also. Serve with little butter on top while Adai is hot. The adais crispness depends on the length of the time on the tawa and can be made according to taste. About Recipe Recipe Tips
